name: Little rose mountain demo
description: You play as Maryanne as she leaves home and goes on a journey.You are taught to be a young sage and you master quests and meet friends on the way. You meet the prince and his mother gets sick, then tragically your whole home village gets sick too and even with your old teacher there to help you, You cant find the cure. menu or exit- X, move -arrow keys, action button- spacebar
